validator.containsUppercase: Have to contain at least 1 uppercase letter
validator.containsLowercase: Have to contain at least 1 lowercase letter
validator.containsNumber: Have to contain at least 1 digit

errors.No user information was found or the dat: No user information was found or the data is incorrect
errors.No user with this email was found: No user with this email was found
errors.A user with this email address already e: A user with this email address already exists

createAccountOrLogIn: Create an account or log in to explore about our app
sentVerificationEmail: We have sent an email to <email> with a verification code.
